question: 仕方
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>doing</kanji> <kanji>way</kanji> is basically a "way of doing" something. More simply put, this is the <vocabulary>method</vocabulary>. "What's your way of doing this?" No no no. "What's your METHOD." There we go.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word uses the on'yomi reading for the first kanji <ja>仕</ja>, and the kun'yomi reading for the second kanji <ja>方</ja>, so watch out for that! You've learned both of these readings already, so you should be able to read this!
